name: Proper Irish Trolly Toss
description:
How To Play!  

Use the left & right arrows to move McGergor! Press Spacebar to throw "Dollys" at the bus! You earn points for hit Khabib! How many can you get before time runs out!

Good luck to Conor and Khabib at UFC 229!

Created by AJSGameDev

Credits
Song: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/812470
